thread.title: Mojo Lingo Receives LumenVox Partner Skills Certification
thread.title_full: Mojo Lingo Receives LumenVox Partner Skills Certification

author: Janeen Pugh
title: Mojo Lingo Receives LumenVox Partner Skills Certification
text:
Mojo Lingo Receives LumenVox Partner Skills Certification LumenVox announced today that Mojo Lingo received LumenVox Partner Skills Certification. LumenVox Partner Skills Certification demonstrates Mojo Lingo’s capability to deliver high quality speech solutions based on the LumenVox speech automation suite.
"Mojo Lingo offers deep, end-to-end expertise in creating multi-channel applications that take advantage of the full LumenVox portfolio. Their broad-based knowledge and experience allows Mojo Lingo to deliver a wide variety of speech driven applications to the marketplace" commented Jeff Hopper, VP Client Services, LumenVox. Mojo Lingo has implemented a series of speech driven applications on the LumenVox platform which have enhanced mobile and web experiences for customers calling from mobile phones into customer contact centers. "After years of delivering successful projects with LumenVox speech technology, Mojo Lingo is proud to formalize our relationship by becoming LumenVox Skills Certified. LumenVox delivers more than just speech engines. They deliver the tools to tune applications for maximum usability and unparalleled personalized support that have made Mojo Lingo and our clients successful. LumenVox makes a great partner, and we look forward to many more successful speech applications with them in the future” stated Ben Klang, Principle/Technology Strategist, Mojo Lingo.
About Mojo Lingo
Mojo Lingo specializes in creating multi-channel, contextual real-time communications applications to improve the customer experience with IVRs and Contact Centers. Mojo Lingo helps carriers, network operators, VoIP providers and enterprises of all sizes connect with their customers while becoming more relevant and compelling. For more information, call +1.404.474.4840 or visit http://www.mojolingo.com .
About LumenVox
LumenVox is a speech automation software company providing core speech technologies that include the LumenVox Speech Recognizer, Text-to-Speech Engine, Call Progress Analysis, Speech Tuner, and natural language solution support. Based on industry standards, LumenVox Speech Software is certified as one of the most accurate, natural sounding, and reliable solutions in the industry. LumenVox technology provides tools for effectively connecting and communicating with users, increasing user satisfaction, and improving employee productivity. For more information, call +1.858.707.7700 or visit http://www.lumenvox.com .
